name: Knit - Wit
description:
Knit-Wit is a push block puzzle game in the style of Nintendo's Gameboy Colour.

Puzzle your way through 15 levels as you find enough wool to knit each of your family members a warm jumper and stave off the winter chills.

CONTROLS

  • Walk with D-pad / Arrow Keys
  • Interact with A / Z
  • Reset Puzzle with Start / Enter

Made with GB Studio.
